list.desc: Identify key features: AI visualizer, document chat, and research assistant.
Establish clear objectives for each feature.
Develop and implement UI components for document upload, text highlighting, and AI interactions.
Integrate AI visualizer and summarizer within the app interface.
Test and optimize backend performance for real-time AI interactions.
Using gpt 4.0 api for generating responses.
Fine-tune chat functionalities with document-specific data.
Set up server infrastructure and databases.
Implement backend logic for handling document uploads and AI processing requests.
Test and optimize backend performance for real-time AI interactions.
Release the app to a select group of beta testers.
Collect user feedback on functionality and usability.
